DOC.brief_summary: Vitamin D deficiency is common in CKD and assciated with CV complications. Endothelial dysfucntion is common in CKD and is a harbinger of atherosclerosis. The study investigated the impact of Vitamin D on endothelial fucntion and blood biomarkers in CKD.
DOC.brief_title: Impact of Vitamin D on Endothelial Function and Blood Biomarkers Including CD28 Null Cells in CKD
DOC.criteria: CKD 34 Age 1880 Recent MI, CVA, malignancy active infection active inflammation High calcium already on Viatmin D therapy
